mapper.select: SELECT MENUNAME, BRANDNO, PRICE, NVL(INFO,'-') INFO, PICTURE FROM MENU

SELECT RM, MENUNAME, BRANDNO, PRICE, NVL(INFO,'-') INFO, PICTURE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MENUNAME DESC) RM, MENUNAME, BRANDNO, PRICE, INFO, PICTURE FROM MENU) WHERE RM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY MENUNAME
